wikipedia_page.main: Andrew M. McIntosh   is a UK academic psychiatrist. He is Professor of Biological Psychiatry at the Centre for Clinical Brain Sciences, University of Edinburgh, and is an affiliate member of the Centre for Genomic and Experimental Medicine at the University of Edinburgh. The main focus of his research is using genomic and neuroimaging approaches to better understand the causes and causal consequences of Major Depressive Disorder.

response: * Andrew McIntosh, Baron McIntosh of Haringey (1933–2010), British Labour politician
* Andrew McIntosh (cricketer) (born 1980), Papua New Guinean cricketer
